document_data.name: Daern Claundon
document_data.mainbody: '''Daern Claundon''', also known as '''Orcbane''', was a [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[adventurer]] from the [[Sword Coast North]] who had risen to fame in the [[Heartlands]] as of the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] for his hatred of [[orc]]s and his tireless pursuit of killing them.{{Cite polyhedron/64/The Everwinking Eye: Daily Life in Mulmaster|20-21}}
document_data.Personality: Daern was characterized by his hatred of orcs and his giddiness at the discovery of dwarven ruins.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1357}},<ref group="note">This date is derived from other entries in the "Current Clack" list in which Daern's story appears, namely the adventures of [[Shaliim Wyrmslayer]]. Daern claimed to have discovered a lost dwarven city beneath the [[Mosstrunks]], an area deep within the woods of the [[Elven Court]] of [[Cormanthor]]. He entreated the dwarven community of [[Tasseldale]] with tales of how well preserved the ruins were, but declined to share how he had found them in the first place. News of his discovery quickly spread as far as [[Mulmaster]], and it became rumored that he had found great wealth, powerful artifacts, or both.
